metadata.description: How well you understand each other's words, tone, and meaning
metadata.sentence_template: When you two talk, it feels ___.

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Mercury aspects show mental compatibility and communication style. Mars adds assertiveness. Jupiter expands understanding.

planet_meanings.Mercury: how you think and express ideas
planet_meanings.Mars: how you assert yourself and handle conflict

very_low.label: Combustible
very_low.guidance: Words easily explode; stress slowing down, not texting in anger.

low.label: Crooked
low.guidance: Messages bend on the way through; suggest asking more questions and repeating back.

mid.label: Hit-or-Miss
mid.guidance: Sometimes sync, sometimes don't; effort matters more than fate.

high.label: Clear
high.guidance: Usually get each other; encourage honest talks.

very_high.label: Telepathic
very_high.guidance: Almost mind-reading; highlight deep talks and shared humor.
